import '../styles/App.scss'; import logoAdalab from '../images/logo-adalab.png'; import logoFontAwesome from '../images/tarjetas-molonas.png'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { //const [palette, setPalette] = useState(''); const [dataCard, setDataCard] = useState({ palette: '1', name: '', job: '', email: '', phone: '', photo: '', linkedin: '', github: '', }); console.log(palette); const handleInput = (event) => { const inputValue = event.target.value; const inputChanged = event.target.name; setDataCard({ ...dataCard, [inputChanged]: inputValue }); }; const handleRadioInputs = (ev) => { const paletteId = ev.target.id; setDataCard[{ ...dataCard, palette: paletteId }]; }; const renderPreview = () => {}; return (

); } export default App;
